title: Empowering Geliyoo to Build the Future of Turkey’s Search and Digital Services
subtitle: Enabling Turkey’s National Digital Search Ecosystem
overview: A visionary Turkish tech company needed a reliable, multi-skilled, and budget-aligned technology partner. Our team stepped in to architect, guide, and manage their entire digital ecosystem — from search to maps, browser, and beyond.

clientOverview.title: Client Overview: Geliyoo Bilişim
clientOverview.description: Geliyoo Bilişim, founded on 18 November 2010 by Buray Anıl Savaş and Fatih Arslan, is a Turkish company specializing in Internet-driven products and services. Their portfolio includes a national search engine, a news aggregator, RSS-based systems, and a web browser (in development). With headquarters in Turkey and led by key executives such as CEO Hakan Atabaş, Geliyoo aims to build a Turkish-first digital ecosystem capable of competing with global giants — personalized for local culture, language, and user needs. Over the years, they have invested significantly into research, testing, and infrastructure, with several public launches in 2013 and a major search engine update in 2017.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Geliyoo’s leadership had a bold vision: Create multiple large-scale digital products in parallel. However, they faced several obstacles:
points: High development costs quoted by major vendors.
Multiple complex projects running at the same time (Search Engine, News Portal, Maps, Browser).
Difficulty finding a single partner capable of handling end-to-end development.
A need for technical architecture, planning, vendor coordination, and quality assurance.
Desire for a partner who could work within their budget while still delivering high-quality output.
challenge.conclusion: Geliyoo needed more than developers — They needed a strategic technology partner who could bring order, clarity, and reliable execution.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: Our team collaborated closely with Geliyoo’s leadership to understand the entire ecosystem they wanted to build. We positioned ourselves not just as a vendor, but as a full-cycle technology consulting and execution partner.

steps.title: 1. Discovery & Strategic Consulting
steps.description: We conducted several rounds of discussions with the founders and CEO to understand their vision, product roadmap, limitations, technical challenges, and expected timelines and budget. We ensured full transparency about our capabilities, technology stack, and execution methods — which immediately built trust.

steps.title: 2. Creating Detailed Scopes for All Projects
steps.description: We prepared complete documentation for Geliyoo Search Engine, Geliyoo Maps, Geliyoo News Portal, Geliyoo Browser, Internal backend systems, and Infrastructure recommendations. This provided Geliyoo a structured project roadmap for the first time.

steps.title: 3. Vendor Association & Team Identification
steps.description: We built a Vendor Association Valuation Sheet to identify the right development teams, match technology skill sets with Geliyoo’s objectives, align cost expectations with realistic requirements, and select trusted partners from India who could collaborate long-term. Within 2 months, we assembled the right team for each major component.

steps.title: 4. Execution, Monitoring & Quality Control
steps.description: Once the development teams were finalized, we took full responsibility for coordinating multiple vendors, defining milestones, monitoring technical progress, ensuring continuous quality control, reducing managerial load on the client, and eliminating communication gaps. This gave Geliyoo the confidence and stability needed to proceed with large-scale development.

impact.title: Impact Delivered
impact.description: Our strategic partnership delivered measurable results:
points: Multiple Geliyoo products successfully developed and launched
Remaining products are in structured, active development
The client now has a clear long-term digital ecosystem roadmap
Execution is faster and more reliable due to coordinated vendor management
The leadership team no longer handles day-to-day technical stress — we do
A strong India–Turkey collaboration ecosystem is established
impact.conclusion: Most importantly, we helped Geliyoo move closer to its national mission: Bringing Turkey its own independent, culturally aligned digital search platform.

quote.text: A national search engine is more than a product. It is a statement that digital sovereignty matters.
quote.author: Cyber Governance Expert

title: Transforming a Growing Beauty Brand Into a High-Performance, Scalable Digital Storefront
subtitle: Pioneers of Beauty in Canada – Orabel
overview: Orabel, a fast-growing beauty brand in Canada, was attracting massive customer attention — but their website could not keep up. Coreway stepped in to rebuild, optimize, and elevate their entire digital commerce experience, making it faster, smoother, and ready for exponential growth.

clientOverview.title: Overview
clientOverview.description: Orabel has established itself as one of Canada's emerging leaders in beauty and cosmetics. Their product catalog expands rapidly, their customer community is active and loyal, and their online brand presence is strong. But when you're pioneering the beauty market, technology must evolve as fast as your customers do. To sustain their growth and offer a superior shopping experience, Orabel needed a stable, scalable, and modern ecommerce foundation.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Delivering exactly what modern shoppers expect — when they expect it — at a price they can afford is the core of ecommerce success. But achieving this is impossible without reliable technology. Orabel faced several issues:
points: Their webstore slowed down dramatically whenever new SKUs were added
High bounce rates due to slow loading pages
A painfully long checkout process, causing serious cart abandonment
Website performance dropped during traffic spikes
Customers demanded smooth navigation, fast browsing, and easy payment options
challenge.conclusion: These challenges affected sales, user satisfaction, and overall brand trust. Frustrated with ongoing technical problems, Orabel turned to the team they trusted most — Coreway — to rebuild their digital storefront and bring their brand vision to life.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: Coreway partnered closely with Orabel to realign their digital strategy and deliver a future-ready ecommerce experience.

steps.title: 1. Technology Assessment & Migration
steps.description: Using analytics and performance audits, we identified the root issues: High bounce rate caused by slow pages, checkout abandonment due to lengthy funnels, and platform limits restricting scalability. We recommended a complete migration to Magento 2, a robust and scalable enterprise-grade ecommerce platform.

steps.title: 2. Full Website Migration & Optimization
steps.description: Coreway took full responsibility for: Migrating the website from the old platform to Magento 2, rebuilding the architecture for speed and stability, optimizing server performance and caching, and reducing page load time significantly.

steps.title: 3. Enhanced UI/UX for Superior Shopping Experience
steps.description: To elevate user engagement, we redesigned: Product listings, navigation and filters, checkout flow, and mobile responsiveness. Every enhancement was driven by behavioral analytics and customer expectations.

steps.title: 4. SEO & Brand Communication Overhaul
steps.description: Coreway optimized: Meta tags and on-page SEO, technical SEO structure, content flow, social media link visibility, and brand communication across pages and channels. This improved Orabel's visibility across search engines and local markets.

impact.title: Impact Delivered
impact.description: Within the first quarter of implementation, Orabel saw extraordinary improvements:
points: #1 Rankings in key local search areas
20% Faster Website Speed
5X Increase in Visitors
3X Increase in Sales
impact.conclusion: Coreway didn't just fix performance issues — we helped Orabel scale into a thriving, high-conversion ecommerce brand.

title: Streamlining the Candidate Verification Process for CandidateVerification.org
subtitle: Automating Political Transparency Through Technology
overview: CandidateVerification.org is a recognized 501(c)(3) public charity promoting transparency in public office by offering free background checks and résumé verifications for election candidates. Coreway automated their entire verification pipeline, reducing manual work by 80%.

clientOverview.title: Client Introduction
clientOverview.description: CandidateVerification.org is a recognized 501(c)(3) public charity in the United States. Their mission is to promote transparency in public office by offering free background checks and résumé verifications for candidates running for election. Their screenings include 10-year criminal & civil record checks, verification of academic qualifications, employment & professional background verification, and military service verification. Their vision is simple yet powerful: Make clean, authenticated candidate records publicly accessible, free, and trustworthy.

challenge.title: Challenges With the Existing Process
challenge.description: The earlier workflow was heavily manual and inefficient:
points: Manual Data Entry Between Systems - Admin manually re-entered candidate data from NationBuilder into TalentWise
Multi-Step Email Reliance - Multiple back-and-forth emails between TalentWise, candidates, and admin for every verification
Report Authenticity Issue - Candidates created manual images of reports which reduced credibility
No Internal Record-Keeping - Zero internal database for candidate history, verification timestamps, or stored reports
High Operational Cost - Admin involvement required at every stage, making the process time-consuming and expensive
challenge.conclusion: The client needed to automate and optimize the verification pipeline while reducing human involvement and operational cost.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We designed a fully integrated and automated system involving custom platform development, NationBuilder API integration, and webhook-driven automation.

steps.title: 1. Own Database & Activity Tracking
steps.description: We created a dedicated system that stores candidate profiles, status updates, verification reports, approval logs, and widget generation data. This enabled 100% controlled, centralized tracking.

steps.title: 2. Automated Webhook-Driven Sync
steps.description: When a candidate registers on NationBuilder, a webhook automatically sends the data to our system, stores it instantly, and notifies admin with structured information. No manual entry required.

steps.title: 3. Seamless TalentWise Integration
steps.description: Admin can push candidate data in 1 step. Completed reports are uploaded to our system, and data is extracted automatically for widgets and profile display.

steps.title: 4. Candidate Approval Workflow
steps.description: Before publishing a candidate publicly, admin requests approval via system. Candidate receives secure link, and once approved, NationBuilder automatically displays the candidate.

steps.title: 5. Widget Management System
steps.description: Once verified, candidates can log in, customize their verification widget, get automatically generated embed code, and receive a dynamic verification image (tamper-proof). This solved the earlier 'fake image' problem with trusted, system-generated verification seals.

impact.title: Impact Delivered
impact.description: The automated system transformed their operations:
points: 80% Reduction in Admin Workload - Automation removed repetitive tasks
Cost Savings - Eliminated dependency on Scribd and manual creation tools
Transparent Candidate Verification - System-generated, trusted widgets improve credibility
Complete Traceability - Every candidate, report, and approval stored with full history
Professional & Scalable Workflow - Prepares the client for future expansion
impact.conclusion: We helped CandidateVerification.org achieve their mission of political transparency through efficient, automated technology.

testimonial.quote: Finally, we are there! You made it. My selection of your team for this solution was perfect. Will forward you our maintenance contract to you. Thanks again for your all hard and smart work.
